result.title: Qualifications FAQ
result.content:
Q: How many teams are currently registered for qualifications ? A:24 teams. Q: How many teams will enter the national contest from our university ?
A:Last year there was 16 teams, this year it should be around the same number +2/-2.
Q: Are the qualifications important for the regional contest ?
A:The qualifications are only for the national contest, for the regional contest teams will be registered in order of their ranking in the ECPC
Q: How many teams will enter the regional contest from our university ?
A: My current estimate is 3 teams, I am not sure about this.

If you have any general questions feel free to ask in the comments.
